text: @pbump @feliciasonmez "Media pandemic" is not madness - it is a calculated script and direction of WHO & Co - if it was not for the test it would be a mere wave of "flu" - annual illness caused by various viruses, including coronavirus in a small%. The more tests, the more "cases" - But not the sick.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
